TopicTitle: The thing of spam and trololololness!

Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome to THE THING OF SPAM

Were you can post what ever you please!

NOT RULES

You can post to up your post count!

or if you so wish post a pic of a duck You Can!

But The Rules Are This:

All Forum Rules But Not Spam and Trolling ONLY IN THIS NO WERE ELSE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Let The Spam START!
I'd say this may get locked quite soon.

Indeed. But, if all the spam is contained into spam-in-a-can, maybe it will work...

so, lemme see

 that good? lol.

The irony of this thread is that posts on Off-Topic don't actually count toward your post count..

Moderator Comment: Thread locked. Don't go around creating threads that encourage breaking of the rules. Thanks.
